title: Zine & Chill
description: Bring your creativity and chill vibes—join us for an afternoon of DIY zine-making and chats.

title: Gen Z Mental Health Circle
description: A safe, low-pressure space to talk mental wellness, journaling, and grounding practices.

title: Open Mic Night: No Ego, Just Vibes
description: Poetry, music, rants or comedy—whatever you’ve got, bring it. Or just vibe in the crowd.

title: Late Night Study Café
description: Come grind, read or chill with lo-fi beats, free tea, and ambient lighting.

title: Queer Creative Meetup
description: Meet other LGBTQ+ creatives for a chill evening of drawing, collage, and collab energy.

title: Zero Pressure Networking
description: No business cards. No elevator pitches. Just real convos with young people doing cool stuff.

title: Art in the Park
description: Grab a sketchpad and hang with other doodlers and painters in a relaxed outdoor setting.

title: Creative Coding Lounge
description: Experiment with visual code and generative art. No experience needed.

title: Culture Swap Hangout
description: Bring a snack, song, or story from your background and share in this cross-cultural chill sesh.

title: Vinyl & Vibes
description: A meet-cute for music nerds: bring a vinyl or playlist to share and connect over sounds.

title: Swap & Style
description: Refresh your wardrobe the sustainable way—bring clothes to swap, stay for the vibes and styling tips.

title: Digital Detox Picnic
description: Phones off. Snacks out. Hang with others who just wanna unplug in nature for a bit.

title: Introvert Link-Up
description: Low-stimulation space for quiet convos, journaling, or just being around others who get it.

title: TikTok Creators Meet
description: Whether you're lurking or posting, meet other Gen Z creators to collab, laugh, and plan trends.

title: Plant Swap & Chat
description: Come trade cuttings, share tips, and obsess over your leafy green children with fellow plant people.

title: Poetry in the Pub
description: An open mic for spoken word, sad boy rhymes, and chaotic 3am thoughts. No pressure to perform.

title: Study + Snacks
description: A focused co-study session with chill playlists, snacks, and no judgment. Just get stuff done.

title: Wellness Walk & Talk
description: Group walk for mindfulness, movement, and genuine convos—headphones optional, vibes guaranteed.

title: Young Creatives Crit Club
description: Share your visual work, get feedback, or just support others. All mediums welcome.

title: Board Games & Chill
description: Unwind with classic games, snacks, and solid company. No gatekeeping allowed.
